error.emptyField: Please fill in all the required fields
error.invalidPolicy: Please read and accept the policy
error.lowercaseMiss: Password should include at least 1 lowercase letter
error.uppercaseMiss: Password should include at least 1 uppercase letter
error.numberMiss: Password should include at least 1 number
error.specialKeyMiss: Password should include at least 1 special character
error.newPasswordNotChange: Current password and new password can't be the same
error.refreshTokenExpired: Your active session has expired. Please login again
error.minMaxSlots: Minumum value of max slots is 1!
error.dateInFuture: Date must be in the future!
error.dateAfterStart: End date must be after start date!
error.invalidResetPasswordToken: Reset password token is invalid or has expired
error.externalLogin: Third party login does not support password reset
error.externalChangePassword: Third party login does not support password change
error.teacherEnrollCourse: You can not enroll your own course!
error.userReEnroll: You have already enrolled this course!
error.alreadyReviewed: You have already left a review!
error.notAdmin: You must have admin permissions to do this action
error.passwordSocialLogin: You cannot change password for social account

auth.verifyAccountAlert: Please verify your email to have the full experience
auth.verifyAccountSuccess: Verify account success. Please return to the homepage to use the app.
auth.verifyAccountFail: Verify account fail. The verify link appears to be invalid or expired. Please click the button below to receive a new link.
auth.alreadyVerified: You have been verified. Please return to the homepage to use the app.
auth.sendForgotPasswordEmailSuccess: An email to confirm reset password has been sent
auth.sendForgotPasswordEmailFail: Send confirm reset password email fail

courses.subject: Subject

courseDetails.whatWillYouLearn: What will you learn from this course

accountSetting.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us something more about you...

teacherProfile.step1Subtitle: This video explains the fundamentals of being a teacher on LetMeet. You can also learn more about teaching with the Teacher Guide
teacherProfile.step2Subtitle: All fields are required. While we ask about professional teaching experience, it's not a requirement to teach on LetMeet. At this time, you must be based in the Viet Nam to teach on LetMeet.
teacherProfile.step2Extra2: Please feel free at this step, your information will not be shared.
teacherProfile.step2Extra3: Make any edits you want. You can make more changes after it's live.
teacherProfile.publicTeacherNameTooltip: This will be seen on your class listings and teacher profile. It can be edited later
teacherProfile.phoneNumberTooltip: This is only used by LetMeet when we need to contact you
teacherProfile.onlineProfileTooltip: Professional website, Facebook page, or LinkedIn profile. This helps describe your experience and expertise
teacherProfile.shortDescriptionTooltip: This assist students in getting to know you better
teacherProfile.clickAdd: to add new education or experience
teacherProfile.title: Title
teacherProfile.organizationPlaceholder: Ex: Nguyen Huu Cau High School
teacherProfile.currentlyWorking: I am currently working on this position
teacherProfile.step3: Step 3: Tell us about your classes
teacherProfile.step3Subtitle: We'd like to learn more about your class, please fill out the fields below.
teacherProfile.info1: What topics are you passionate about teaching? Which grades of learners do you want to work with? What experience or expertise do you have in these subject areas?
teacherProfile.info1Tooltip: It's fine to discuss broad topics here (no need to have the perfect class title)
teacherProfile.info2: How will your class be structured? Fill in the blanks with an example of a class description
teacherProfile.info2Tooltip: Include information about what you plan to teach, how you plan to teach it, and what students can expect from class time. This field is only for our team and will not be made public
teacherProfile.step4: Step 4: Teach or explain us something!
teacherProfile.sample1: Upload a 3-5 minute video in which you demonstrate a sample of the above-mentioned class. This video will be kept private and unavailable to students. It allows our team to quickly assess who you are and the type of teaching environment you will provide to Letmeet learners.
teacherProfile.sample2: This is some advice for you:
teacherProfile.sampleItem1: Recommended video length: 3-5 minutes (make sure it is 100mb or less)
teacherProfile.sampleItem2: If uploading your video, check to make sure it is 100mb or less
teacherProfile.sampleItem3: Show us the space where you will teach
teacherProfile.sampleItem5: Share your knowledge! Teach us something that you are excited to share with LetMeet students
teacherProfile.uploadYoutubeVideo: Or you can upload through Youtube:
